swordprowesslv2.name: Sword Prowess Lv 2
swordprowesslv2.desc: Grants Hit +6, Avo +10, and Crit Avo +6 when using a sword.

swordprowesslv3.name: Sword Prowess Lv 3
swordprowesslv3.desc: Grants Hit +7, Avo +13, and Crit Avo +7 when using a sword.

swordprowesslv4.name: Sword Prowess Lv 4
swordprowesslv4.desc: Grants Hit +8, Avo +16, and Crit Avo +8 when using a sword.

swordprowesslv5.name: Sword Prowess Lv 5
swordprowesslv5.desc: Grants Hit +10, Avo +20, and Crit Avo +10 when using a sword.

tomebreaker.name: Tomebreaker
tomebreaker.desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when brawling against magic users.

transmute.name: Transmute
transmute.desc: If unit is hit with a magic attack during enemy phase, grants +3 to all stats until next player phase ends.

twincrests.name: Twin Crests
twincrests.desc: Allows unit to take two actions in one turn.

unarmedcombat.name: Unarmed Combat
unarmedcombat.desc: Allows unit to fight without a weapon.

reference.Class:
Brawler (Class ability)
Brawler (Mastery)
Grappler (Class ability)
War Cleric (Class ability)
War Monk (Class ability)

uncannyblow.name: Uncanny Blow
uncannyblow.desc: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit +30 during combat.

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc: When foe initiates combat, unit still attacks first if HP is <= 50%.

veteranknight.name: Veteran Knight
veteranknight.desc: Unit takes 2 less damage while in formation with a battalion.

vitaldefense.name: Vital Defense
vitaldefense.desc: Makes critical hits against this unit impossible.

wardingblow.name: Warding Blow
wardingblow.desc: If unit initiates combat, grants Res +6 during combat

whitemagicavoid20.name: White Magic Avo +20
whitemagicavoid20.desc: Grants Avo +20 when using white magic.

whitemagiccrit10.name: White Magic Crit +10
whitemagiccrit10.desc: When using white magic, Grants Crit +10 .

whitemagicheal10.name: White Magic Heal +10
whitemagicheal10.desc: Heal 10 extra HP when using white magic.

whitemagicheal5.name: White Magic Heal +5
whitemagicheal5.desc: Heal 5 extra HP when using white magic.

whitemagicrange1.name: White Magic Range +1
whitemagicrange1.desc: Increases white magic range by 1 for attacks that damage foes.

whitemagicusesup.name: White Magic Uses Up+
whitemagicusesup.desc: Quadruples the number of uses for white magic.

whitemagicusesx2.name: White Magic Uses x2
whitemagicusesx2.desc: Doubles the number of uses for white magic.

whitetomefaire.name: White Tomefaire
whitetomefaire.desc: Grants Atk +5 when using white magic.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc: If foe initiates combat while unit's HP is <= 50%, grants Crit +50.

apocalypticflame.name: Apocalyptic Flame
apocalypticflame.desc: Inflicts Str -5 on foe for 1 turn, effective against Dragon foes.

armoredstrike.name: Armored Strike
armoredstrike.desc: Might increases by 30% of user's Defence.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +15, can kill enemies instantly.

beastfang.name: Beast Fang
beastfang.desc: Effective against Cavalry and Dragon foes.

breakshot.name: Break Shot
breakshot.desc: After combat, inflicts Def -5 on foe for 1 turn.

burningquake.name: Burning Quake
burningquake.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, Might increases by 30% of user's Speed, effective against Dragon foes.

drainingblow.name: Draining Blow
drainingblow.desc: Restores HP equal to 50% of the damage inflicted to the enemy.

drawback.name: Draw Back
drawback.desc: User moves 1 space backwards and ally is moved to where the user was previously.

dust.name: Dust
dust.desc: Inflicts Def -5 on foe for 1 turn, effective against Dragon foes.

encloser.name: Encloser
encloser.desc: Inflicts Frozen on the target on contact.

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.desc: Calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

exhaustivestrike.name: Exhaustive Strike
exhaustivestrike.desc: Depletes all of the weapon's remaining durability and adds 30% of that value to Might.

fadingblow.name: Fading Blow
fadingblow.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +30, after combat, user moves 1 space backwards.

fallenstar.name: Fallen Star
fallenstar.desc: Avoids all attacks during the next round of combat, effective against Dragon foes.

finesseblade.name: Finesse Blade
finesseblade.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, Might increases by 30% of user's Dexterity.

flickeringflower.name: Flickering Flower
flickeringflower.desc: Inflicts Frozen on the target on contact.

foudroyantstrike.name: Foudroyant Strike
foudroyantstrike.desc: Effective against Armoured and Dragon foes.

foulplay.name: Foul Play
foulplay.desc: Unit swaps positions with an ally in range.

frozenlance.name: Frozen Lance
frozenlance.desc: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases by 30% of user's Dexterity.

glowingember.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, Might increases by 30% of user's Defence.

heavensfall.desc: Might increases by 30% of user's Magic

hitandrun.name: Hit and Run
hitandrun.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +20, after combat, user moves 1 space backwards.

lancejab.name: Lance Jab
lancejab.desc: Might increases by 30% of user's Speed.

lightningaxe.name: Lightning Axe
lightningaxe.desc: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases by 30% of user's Resistance.

monsterpiercer.name: Monster Piercer
monsterpiercer.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, effective against Monster foes.

nimblecombo.name: Nimble Combo
nimblecombo.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +20, triggers 2 consecutive hits.

paraselene.name: Paraselene
paraselene.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, after combat, user moves 1 space backwards.

pneumagale.name: Pneuma Gale
pneumagale.desc: Magic attack. Can attack from long range.

pointblankvolley.name: Point-Blank Volley
pointblankvolley.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, triggers 2 consecutive hits.

ragingstorm.name: Raging Storm
ragingstorm.desc: After attacking, user can move again, effective against Dragon foes.

reposition.name: Reposition
reposition.desc: User moves ally to the space behind the user.

ruinedsky.name: Ruined Sky
ruinedsky.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, effective against Flying and Dragon foes.

rupturedheaven.name: Ruptured Heaven
rupturedheaven.desc: Might increases by 30% of user's Magic, effective against Dragon foes.

rushingblow.name: Rushing Blow
rushingblow.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +10, after combat, user moves 1 space in front of the enemy.

schismshot.name: Schism Shot
schismshot.desc: After combat, inflicts Res -5 on foe for 1 turn.

shatterslash.name: Shatter Slash
shatterslash.desc: After combat, inflicts Def -5 on foe for 1 turn.

soulblade.name: Soulblade
soulblade.desc: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases by 30% of user's Resistance.

subdue.name: Subdue
subdue.desc: Leaves foe with at least 1 HP.

sublimeheaven.name: Sublime Heaven
sublimeheaven.desc: Might increases by 30% of user's Magic, effective against Dragon foes.

swap.name: Swap
swap.desc: User swaps places with the enemy.

sworddance.name: Sword Dance
sworddance.desc: Avoid and Crit Avoid +20, Might increases by 30% of user's Charm.

triangleattack.name: Triangle Attack
triangleattack.desc: Can only be triggered when 3 allied Flying units (including the user) are adjacent to the same enemy.

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.desc: Damage increases by (user's Max HP - Current HP).

waningshot.name: Waning Shot
waningshot.desc: After combat, inflicts Str -5 on foe for 1 turn.

wardarrow.name: Ward Arrow
wardarrow.desc: Inflicts Silence on the target on contact.
